Package org.jetel.metadata

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataFieldMetadata
    A class that represents metadata describing one particular data field.
    DataRecordMetadata
    A class that represents metadata describing a data record.
    DataRecordMetadataStub  
    DataRecordMetadataXMLReaderWriter
    Helper class for reading/writing DataRecordMetadata (record structure) from/to XML format
    Note: If for record or some field Node are defined more attributes than those recognized, they are transferred to Java Properties object and assigned to either record or field.
    MetadataFactory  
    MetadataRepository
    This is repository of statically defined metadata via plugin extension point "metadata".
    MetadataUtils
    Various utilities for data record metadata manipulation.
    MetadataXsd
    Transforms xsd document into DataRecordMetadata.
    MXAbstract  
    XsdMetadata
    Class implementing export of data record metadata to XSD.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BinaryFormat
    Enumeration of formats that may be used when reading (multibyte) binary data.
    DataFieldContainerType
    Container type of data field - SINGLE, LIST and MAP.
    DataFieldFormatType  
    DataFieldType
    Enumeration of all build-in clover data types.
    DataRecordParsingType
    Enumeration of types of flat file parsing.
